As an AI language model, I cannot provide recommendations per se but I can provide some suggestions that travelers can consider:

1. Hostels - Belo Horizonte has several hostels that offer budget-friendly accommodations for backpackers and solo travelers. Some of the popular ones include The Hostel BH, Hostel 300, and Green Hill Hostel.

2. Airbnb - There are many affordable Airbnb options in Belo Horizonte, particularly in the neighborhoods of Santo Antonio and Savassi.

3. Hotel ibis budget BH Minascentro - This hotel is centrally located and offers basic yet comfortable accommodations at an affordable price.

4. Hotel Pampulha - This hotel is located in the Pampulha neighborhood, a popular tourist area of Belo Horizonte. It offers clean and comfortable rooms at a reasonable price.

5. Hotel Vivenzo - This hotel is located in the Cidade Nova neighborhood, close to the city center. It offers comfortable rooms at a reasonable price.

It is always advisable to read customer reviews and compare prices before making a booking.
